COMPANY_PROFILE:
*Company Name:* anyword.com

*One-liner description:* A leading AI-powered writing assistant that helps businesses and individuals create high-quality content.

*Founding date:* 2013

*Use cases:*
- Content creation
- Content optimization
- Social media management
- Email marketing
- Customer support

*Fundings amount details:*
- $1.3 million in seed funding in 2014
- $6 million in Series A funding in 2016
- $12 million in Series B funding in 2017
- $25 million in Series C funding in 2019

*Target user persona:*
- Content creators
- Marketers
- Business owners
- Entrepreneurs

*Features offered:*
- AI-powered writing assistance
- Content optimization tools
- Social media post scheduling
- Email marketing automation
- Customer support chatbot

*Integrations available:*
- WordPress
- Shopify
- Zapier
- HubSpot
- Salesforce

*Pricing packages offered:*
- Basic: $19/month
- Professional: $49/month
- Business: $99/month

*List of investors by VC name:*
- Y Combinator
- General Catalyst
- Intel Capital
- Founders Fund

*List of investors by lead investor name:*
- Brad Feld
- Jason Calacanis
- Sam Altman
- Peter Thiel

*Relevant URLs for further research:*
- https://www.anyword.com/
- https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/anyword
- https://www.linkedin.com/company/anyword/

- Email writing
